title: CrikeTic.com
description: An interactive timer for focus, rhythm, and productivity.
footer: Â© {year} Rodrigo Salazar. All rights reserved.

instructions.title: Set Subdivisions:
instructions.content: Break the time into smaller intervals for better focus.

instructions.title: Hit Start:
instructions.content: Watch the analog clock tick and track progress visually.

instructions.title: Auditory Cues:
instructions.content: Hear crickets at each interval and a bell when time is up.

instructions.title: Stay on Track:
instructions.content: Use visual and sound cues to manage your time effectively.
